docs.snippet: U.S. President Barack Obama spoke to Myanmar President Thein Sein and opposition leader Aung San Suu Kyi in separate telephone calls on Thursday, the White House said....

headline.main: Obama Speaks to Myanmar President, Opposition Leader Suu Kyi
headline.print_headline: Obama Speaks to Myanmar President, Opposition Leader Suu Kyi

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Barack Obama spoke to Myanmar President Thein Sein and opposition leader Aung San Suu Kyi in separate telephone calls on Thursday, the White House said.

docs.snippet: Sauber principal Monisha Kaltenborn has urged Formula One's decision makers to act in the sport's best interests and tackle  a looming crisis after two teams went into administration in the space of a week....

headline.main: Formula One Urged to Cut Costs as Teams Fail
headline.print_headline: Formula One Urged to Cut Costs as Teams Fail

docs.lead_paragraph: Sauber principal Monisha Kaltenborn has urged Formula One's decision makers to act in the sport's best interests and tackle  a looming crisis after two teams went into administration in the space of a week.

docs.snippet: Should you reward those who obey the unwritten rules of Halloween — dress up, be a child, say “trick-or-treat” — with better sweets?...

docs.abstract: Should you reward those who obey the unwritten rules of Halloween — dress up, be a child, say “trick-or-treat” — with better sweets?

docs.snippet: Gregg Allman has been dropped from a lawsuit by the family of a film worker killed by a train during shooting of a biographical movie about the Allman Brothers Band singer, attorneys said Thursday....

headline.main: Allman Dropped From Georgia Lawsuit in Train Crash
headline.print_headline: Allman Dropped From Georgia Lawsuit in Train Crash

docs.lead_paragraph: Gregg Allman has been dropped from a lawsuit by the family of a film worker killed by a train during shooting of a biographical movie about the Allman Brothers Band singer, attorneys said Thursday.

docs.snippet: For two days, Lazaro Allegue has scoured the waters of Miami's Biscayne Bay and combed the thick brush on nearby keys in search of his son....

docs.lead_paragraph: For two days, Lazaro Allegue has scoured the waters of Miami's Biscayne Bay and combed the thick brush on nearby keys in search of his son.

docs.snippet: Japanese telecom and media group SoftBank Corp has set its sights on the wireless assets put up for sale by America Movil, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter....

docs.snippet: The Italian Supercup between last year's Serie A champions Juventus and Italian Cup winners Napoli will take place in Doha on Dec. 22, Serie A confirmed on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Italian Supercup between last year's Serie A champions Juventus and Italian Cup winners Napoli will take place in Doha on Dec. 22, Serie A confirmed on Thursday.
